snippet.title: Red Dead Redemption and Undead Nightmare Now on Nintendo Switch and PS4
snippet.description: Red Dead Redemption, the Western adventure that defined a generation, and its groundbreaking zombie-horror companion, Undead Nightmare, are now available on the Nintendo Switch and for the PS4, with backwards compatibility for the PS5: http://rsg.ms/e1c5438
